Title: {{name}}’s winery

Winery.Title: The Winery
Winery.1: Giuseppe Negro’s winery is located  in the municipal district of Neive, one of the most renowned areas for the production of the typical local wines “Vini Albesi”.
Winery.2: The firm is managed directly by the owner, oenologist Giorgio Negro who characterizes his production exclusively on quality; his wines are destined to the best restaurants in Italy and abroad.

Tradition.Title: The Tradition
Tradition.1: Since the early 50’s, Giuseppe Negro ran first hand his vineyard and the winery, making small quantities of excellent quality wine.
Tradition.2: Now with the same passion his son produces wines that aim to satisfy the most expert and demanding clientele.

Where.1: Negro Giuseppe winery is located in Gallina place, in the municipal district of Neive.
Where.2: A few kilometres from Alba, it is easily reachable through A33 motorway, Castagnito exit.

Contacts.Title: To contact our winery and book a tasting of our wines

Tasting.Title: Tasting
Tasting.1: Tours of the winery can be arranged. The experience starts with a visit to the wine cellars where the winemaking and aging in wood and the bottle take place.
Tasting.2: A tasting of our wines follows in the old cellar or on the Monsú  terrace overlooking the vineyards.
Tasting.3: According to the wines and vintages available at the time of the tastings, some changes could be make.
